resources.string:
- [Feature] Ability to cancel board detection halfway
- [Feature] Edit board even after solving
- [Feature] Edit board for unsolvable boards
- [Feature] Set minimum hints required for board to be deemed valid
- [Feature] Set maximum number of possible solutions to be found

- [User Interface] UI overhaul! Too many to list

- [General] Pressing back on OCR page won't exit app, requires 2x press
- [General] Pressing back on board input page will transit to OCR page
- [General] Added a tutorial for first time launch
- [General] Added help, changelog, donations, credits

- Bug fixes and code optimisation
